The Knack Of.name: A Great Start
The Knack Of.description: Teaching you the basics about Tap Tap Adventure!

0: I do not wish to keep you for too long
So let us proceed with a quick tutorial.
1: See that spooky arrow? You should click it.
Trust me.. It's really the only way to progress...
Come on man.. Just do it please..
I don't have a lot of time and there are other newbies here.
2: Alright perfect, clearly you are capable of clicking things.
It is pretty self explanatory so I do not want to drag this tutorial.
Please go to the next instructor to finish your quick tutorial.

4: Oh, another one. Here, take this sword and get outta here.
I would bother teaching you but
It is more fun to let newbies figure it out.
5: Go through the portal there to get to the main land.
